meanings.definition: A substance that neutralizes acid in the stomach.
meanings.sent1: I took an antacid after eating spicy food.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended an antacid for my stomach ache.
meanings.sent3: The antacid worked like magic, calming my stomach instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an antacid, soothing the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The antacid fizzed in the glass, ready to provide relief.
